reviewText: This Dvd is a professional product which has inspired my students as well as myself. My students are really learning. I recommend this lovely video to all interested in personal finance. 5 stars.
It is a lot of information to take in all at once.  My kids lost interest after about 20 minutes.  But it is made in segments so you can break it up a bit.

I've been looking for something like this to help teach my children about money.  I was worried that they wouldn't like it or pay attention, but as a family, we really enjoyed watching the DVD together.  Now, we are using a lot of this information to make better decisions with our money.

Bought it for my 11 year old nephew. He loves it and has already begun learning to save his money. I watched it and was amazed and amused at the production. Its not cheesy like barney. Its cool for every one.
